I post it in the issues Tracker section...

 

I want to know about this bad chracaters... ^^

In my opinion, the topic speak for himself. But by the way the discription:

-trailing or leading whitespace http://wpf.codeplex.com/workitem/10707?ProjectName=wpf
-with "." in columnname http://wpf.codeplex.com/workitem/11222?ProjectName=wpf

And things on my research:
-leading (
-columnnames with [ && ]
-/
Anything else?

http://wpf.codeplex.com/workitem/16645

Ok, i wrote a list file and test the DataTable on typical special charaters...

My Result is:

( = open bracket

) = closed bracket

[ = open square bracket

] = closed square bracket

. = dot

/ = Slash

\ = Backslash

 

crash the cell's of a DataTable if this characters are in the DateColumnName...
